name: Healing Buds Video Hero
author: Healing Buds Design Team
description: Immersive full-screen video hero with parallax scrolling and comprehensive design system. Perfect for medical cannabis brands seeking a modern, premium aesthetic with consistent branding across all pages.

changelog.2.0.0: Complete design system overhaul with 30+ CSS variables, fixed all text visibility issues, enhanced accessibility
changelog.1.0.0: Initial release with video hero, parallax scrolling, and basic customization
